U

update() - Method in class GUI.BattleScreen
Updates all aspects of the gui, including the player and enemy monster health and damage, the player's items and attacks, and the switchable monsters.
update() - Method in class GUI.ShopScreen
Updates the gui to contain the current stock, the current inventory, the current team and the current gold.
updateBattles() - Method in class game.GameEnvironment
Updates the days battles, based on the current day and difficulty, wild battles occur every 3 days, and the number of battles is 3 in the early days, and up to 5 by the end of the game.
updateBattlesTest() - Method in class test.GameEnvironmentTest
 
updateItems() - Method in class GUI.ItemScreen
Updates the items gui list after one is used.
updateItemUsableMonsters() - Method in class GUI.BattleScreen
Updates the drop down selection for monsters to use an item on, as certain items are available for use on different monsters.
updateMonsterList() - Method in class GUI.TeamScreen
Updates the gui monster list to contain the current team after renames, removals and reorders.
updateMonsters() - Method in class GUI.ItemScreen
Updates the monsters gui list to contain only the player's monsters which the currently selected item can be used on.
useItem(Item, Monster) - Method in class game.Player
Uses an item on the given monster, removing the item from the invenventory once done.
useItem(Item, Player) - Method in class commandline.InventoryCommandLine
Displays the monsters in the player's team that an item may be used on and prompts the user to either return to the prievious menu or use the item on one of those monsters.
useItem(Monster) - Method in class game.Item
Uses this item on the given monster, either healing the monster, calling Monster.rest(), or adding a damage buff to the monster.
useItemTest() - Method in class test.ItemTest
 
useItemTest() - Method in class test.PlayerTest
